text.more:
This graph represents the whole network of Bassani's "Gli occhiali d'oro": the corpora is the full text and the various entities/nodes are firstly divided in types: there are Characters (identifiable with warmer colours) and Places (identifiable with colder colours). Then, each type is divided in classes: for what concerns the Places we have Ferrara, Bologna and the Adriatic Region; for what concerns the characters, we have different social classes and roles.
It is therefore possible to infer new connections and relations between the entities of the book.
text.intro:
Browse through the various relationships in Bassani's "Gli occhiali d'oro".
Click on a node to see its connections or select different classes representing the book's communities: for places (Ferrara, Bologna or Adriatic locations) and people (historical and cultural characters, the group of students, the narrator's family, characters belonging and representing the bourgeoisie and "others").
text.title: Gli Occhiali d'Oro Graph
